entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
